model_purpose: The GNN model represents a Partially Observable Markov Decision Process (POMDP) for an agent managing an investment portfolio aboard an airplane. The model aims to simulate decision-making under uncertainty, where financial losses impact fuel reserves, thus posing unique challenges in trading strategies.

NivelCombustible.description: Represents the fuel level of the airplane.

RendimientoMercado.description: Represents the performance of the market.

EstrategiaInversion.description: The investment strategy chosen by the agent.

B_f0.description: Transition probabilities for fuel level given previous states and actions.

B_f1.description: Transition probabilities for market performance based on previous states and actions.

C_m0.description: Log preferences over fuel gauge outcomes, favoring 'Lleno'.

C_m1.description: Log preferences over trading outcomes, favoring 'Ganancia'.

D_f0.description: Prior probabilities for the initial fuel level state.

D_f1.description: Prior probabilities for the initial market performance state.

initial_states.D_f0: Maps to initial hidden state s_f0 (NivelCombustible)
initial_states.D_f1: Maps to initial hidden state s_f1 (RendimientoMercado)

observations.s_f0, s_f1: Determine the likelihood of observations A_m0 (IndicadorCombustible) and A_m1 (ResultadoOperacion).

state_transitions.s_f0, s_f1, u_c0: Determine the next states through transition dynamics B_f0 and B_f1.

expected_free_energy.C_m0, C_m1, A_m0, A_m1, B_f0, B_f1, s_f0: Influence the computation of Expected Free Energy G.

policy_actions.G: Influences the policy vector pi_c0 for action selection.

potential_applications: Simulating trading strategies in uncertain environments.
Analyzing the impact of financial decisions on operational resources.
Training agents in reinforcement learning scenarios with real-world constraints.
limitations_or_ambiguities: The B_f0 transition dynamics require careful normalization to ensure valid probability distributions.
The model's complexity may pose challenges in practical implementation and interpretation.
Assumptions about the independence of observations from certain states may not hold in all scenarios.

ontology_mapping_assessment.assessment: The ActInfOntology terms are present and relevant, mapping well to the underlying components of the model. This enhances the clarity and interoperability of the model with other frameworks.
